title: Business leaders urge MPs to back Brexit deal in final lobbying push
text:
Business leaders have urged MPs to swing behind Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal and end the deadlock damaging investment and growth.

More than half of business leaders back the deal and believe it would be the best outcome for their company, a poll by the Institute of Directors revealed in the run-up to the knife-edge votes in Parliament.

The survey of more than 600 businesses found that nine in 10 were against a no-deal Brexit but were largely split on what should happen next if there is an extension beyond Oct 31. A snap election was the least negative option among respondents.
